showerReviews.reviewText: … me pick out some great smelling oil perfume/cologne made local, good food with fast service, $25 parking/24hr, shower is $20 unisex camp/locker-room style with stalls sink on outside the toilets are separate room. Laundry $2 quarters …
… And the guy said I have to pay $10 for the shower and $15 for the parking I can get a free shower if I feel up for 100 gallons**** …
Too Expensive. Everything inside is mess. Shower price is 20$, parking 25$, food with one mill 26$. Shower is terrible mess and you should avoid this place ever. …

DO NOT COME TO THIS ESTABLISHMENT!  READ THE REVIEWS. THEY ARE ACCURATE.

Stopped in here for a shower the man wanted $20. (Not worth more than $5) the shower room has no locking door so it is not private and it is very dirty.

What a filthy place.  I'm surprised that this place hasn't been shut down.  In addition,  $25 to park and $15 for a shower? It was late at night and there was hardly any parking around the area.  I won't be back.  I will park on a ramp or …
… 15 dollars to take a shower here is a joke. They should pay 50 for people to shower here. …

… . 06-02-2022, I'm a truck driver who had a late delivery on that night. I called before I came ask was it ok if I take a shower and use the bathroom. The african guy who was working the desk was already rude when I called as if he was …
Only reason I'm giving two stars is the fuel price!!   Showers are nasty!  They charge $12 for over night parking EVEN WHEN YOU BUY FUEL!! …

WT* did I just pay $10 for? Took a shower in the ladies shower. I don't mind it being old and run down, but why can't they clean it? The place obviously had not been cleaned in a looooong time. Unswept floors, nasty walls, hairs stuck …

Do not shower here. Found crack pipe In bathroom. Washed hands and dried hands off with towel then threw it in hamper. That towel cost me 10 bucks because I wanted a refund on shower. Disgusting, nasty, unkept and rude employees. RUN, RUN, …
